body:
Sorry, no where to register to spackpm.slack.com. So, have to ask question here.
Will you pls check the steps to access the slack channel above? Not work for me at all.

My question is:

```
# spack find python
==> 1 installed packages.
-- linux-rhel7-x86_64 / gcc@4.8.5 -------------------------------
python@2.7.15
[root@c910f04x28v04 ~]# python -V
Python 2.7.5                               
```
I have installed python 2.7.15 in my system, how can I use it? No document I can find that mention the using the installed packages. Thx for your time!
title: How to use the package installed with spack
